properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Over all the earth
You reign on high
Every mountain stream,
Every sunset sky.
But my one request,
Lord, my only aim
Is that You'd reign in me again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Over every thought,
over every word,
May my life reflect the beauty of my Lord;
'Cause you mean more to me
Than any earthly thing,
So won't You reign in me again

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord, reign in me,
Reign in Your power;
Over all my dreams,
In my darkest hour.
You are the Lord of all I am,
So won't You reign in me again.
